name: Marblize
description: Marblize is a physics-based puzzle platformer where you must traverse through obstacles and hazards, solve challenging logic puzzles, and collect various collectables to customize your marble. Play through over 60 levels of varying difficulty in captivating worlds.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel Core i7-2600K Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
